Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: mostly reserved with band of dots between dilute lines around rim.
Curator's comments: 'AΠ' is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd. For parallels, see British Museum 1924,1201.654.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 302 no. 1088)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1015) (phase 2)
